Package by.epam.jwd.web.dao

Interface UserDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dao<User>
    public interface UserDao
extends Dao<User>
    User data access object interface. Extends Dao base interface.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    "Data access object pattern"

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.Optional<User> findUserByLogin​(java.lang.String login)
      Finds and returns result of find User with specified name.
      java.util.List<User> findUsersByRole​(UserRole role)
      Finds and returns result of find users that have passed role.

      • Methods inherited from interface by.epam.jwd.web.dao.Dao

        delete, findAll, findById, findPage, getPagesAmount, getRowsAmount, save, update

    • Method Detail

      • findUserByLogin

        java.util.Optional<User> findUserByLogin​(java.lang.String login)
        Finds and returns result of find User with specified name. Returns user if there is user with passed name in database table. or empty optional otherwise
        Parameters:
        login - of user that need to find
        Returns:
        found User if there is user with passed login or empty optional otherwise
        Throws:
        DAOException - when exception in dao layer occurs.

      • findUsersByRole

        java.util.List<User> findUsersByRole​(UserRole role)
        Finds and returns result of find users that have passed role.
        Parameters:
        role - of users that need to find
        Returns:
        Users with specified role
        Throws:
        DAOException - when exception in dao layer occurs.
